summary: A pair of criminals try to track down the kids who witnessed them commit a murder in the woods.
cast: Brendan Fraser|Dominic Purcell|Ethan Suplee|Holly Deveaux|Daniel Kash|Christian Martyn|Amy Price-Francis|Anthony Ulc|Zion Forrest Lee|Arcadia Kendal|Andrew Jackson|Ryan Byrne|Brendan Hennessey|Meegwun Fairbrother|Caine Hussey-Derrer|Lara Daans|G. Scott Paterson|Naomi Andrews|Keith Bowser|Mark Fisher|Layton Morrison|Eddie Nilsson
title: Breakout
